Our Services

No experience is required. Regardless of your skill level, with the help of our coaches, you'll be hitting the target in no time!

Indoor Targets

Want to release some stress on targets in an extraordinary environment?

Come celebrate your:
birthdays bachelor parties bachelorette parties Christmas parties private parties retirement parties

in a unique and unforgettable way.
see more

Outdoor Targets
(mobile)

Maniax® can be moved anywhere!

All we need is a 13'x20' space for our setup and we're ready to go.

Come celebrate your:
birthdays bachelor parties bachelorette parties Christmas parties private parties festivals retirement parties

in a unique and unforgettable way.
see more

Corporate Events
(Team building)

Maniax® is the perfect venue for successful corporate events and team-building activities..

see more

Axe Throwing League

Practice sessions and a competition at the end of 8 weeks.

Become an axe throwing pro. Family-friendly atmosphere. No experience required!
